title: Lyla in the Loop
overview: Lyla in the Loop is a funny and engaging new animated series for kids ages 4-8 about Lyla Loops and her fantastical blue sidekick, Stu, who use creative and strategic problem-solving and critical thinking skills to help their family, friends, and community! From building homemade carnival games to creating a new sandwich for the family restaurantâ€“ Lyla, Stu, and the whole Loops crew tackle challenges with equal servings of humor and heart.
